twn.evt

Class Event<T extends EventArgs>

  • java.lang.Object
    • twn.evt.Event<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - extends EventArgs This class is the code class for the event functionality. In objects of this class listeners subscribe and unsubscribe and the event will be called through the fire method

    public class Event<T extends EventArgs>
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    TyWuNon

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(java.lang.Object lock)
        Instantiates a new event.
        Parameters:
        lock - the event Lock The given Lock is a shared secret between the event and the possible senders of this Event. Only if the same Object reference is hand over in the fire Method the event will actually fire and call all the subscribers. 
        for example: 
 private final Object eventLock = new Object();
 public final Event = new Event<>(eventLock);
        Now only the the class containing this code can fire an event, because no Other class can hand over the right eventLock, but can subscribe to it

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:
        eventHandler - the event handler
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • fire

        public void fire(java.lang.Object lock,
                 java.lang.Object sender,
                 T eventArgs)
        Fire.
        Parameters:
        lock - the event lock
        sender - the sender
        eventArgs - the event args
